Message.Title: Good Morning From Wonderful Philadelphia
Message.Msg: Good morning! What a wonderful day to be happy and sane. I get to see another year's students earn their diplomas knowing that I simply have this ID, am not what who an obviously sick spammer board troll claims I am, nor will any of my students end up as homeless lying jabbering melting board trolls. John Osborne wrecked his children. I inspire mine. I look back on his 1000s of IDs and his billions of hateful words and I laugh and stand tall. The world is happy that I am here, but will be happier when John Osborne, z50com and VW, chokes on his lies and is gone. I hope that helps clear things up.

Topic.Title: A company with such facts is extreme undervalued: with only 36 million like today

Message.Msg: Better Local Audiences at Scale throug Fusion by Local of Local Corp . Fusion by Local makes it possible for brand marketers to reach engaged, ready-to-buy local audiences on a national scale though our vast community of 1,200+ trusted news sites. No need for multiple local vendors and direct relationships to implement local campaigns for their clients. Through a single point of contact, agencies now have access to highly desirable news sites in our transparent premium ad network. Fusion by Local gives your clients the ability to reach millions of people every month in the markets that matter most – simply and efficiently. We work through direct publisher partnerships to offer advertisers tremendous reach within specific categories or DMAs. Whatever your needs are, we work with you to customize and optimize a perfect-fit advertising campaign across the best sites, audiences and channels. Spend less time on buying and more time on strategy.

Topic.Title: EBAY has a way to go on the PayPal initative

Message.Msg: It's not going to happen. Paypal has damaged their reputation over the years with shady business practices, shoddy customer service and forcing it's usage on every consumer who uses eBay. You simply can't force a service on consumers and expect them to fall head over heels for it. 90% of experienced merchants DO NOT leave a balance in Paypal. Why? Google "paypal holds" and "paypal freezes" and you'll see thousands of horror stories from merchants, including the American Red Cross who had their account frozen post hurricane Katrina.
